name: Simplifine
headline: AI-Powered Workspace for Research
description:
Research workflows are broken, forcing researchers to cobble together disconnected tools for literature review, writing, data analysis, and more—tools not designed for their needs.

Simplifine changes everything. Built by researchers, for researchers, it equips you with AI agents that act like JARVIS from Iron Man, capable not only of connecting and analyzing information but also running computational experiments and simulations. Our specialized LLM Agents can design and execute complex research experiments with PhD-level expertise, compressing weeks of work into minutes. With Simplifine, you no longer need to juggle fragmented tools—everything from advanced simulations to data analysis happens in one place.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:productivity; industry:consumer-products; industry:note-taking; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ege Kaan Duman, Founder
founders.description: Rhodes Scholar from Turkey. DKU, Duke, and Oxford alumnus. Musician, poet, cook. I like flowers & watering my flowers. cat & dog enjoyer but mostly fat cat enjoyer.

founders.name: Ali Kavoosi, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Ali is the CTO and founder of Simplifine. He has extensive background in optimising AI models, from putting them on Deep Brain Stimulators to speeding up training/inference on GPUs.

markdown:
raw_markdown="# The App for Academics.
## From literature search & reference management to systematic reviews, making research simple.
[Start Research](https://www.simplifine.com/</workspace>)Free to Use
## Literature Reviews & Benchmarking Made Simple
From search to analysis, we streamline every step of your research workflow
### Step 1
## Start Your Research Journey
Unified Academic Search
Search across multiple academic sources simultaneously. Compare results side-by-side and find the most relevant papers instantly.
  * Search arXiv, Semantic Scholar, Google Scholar, and more at once
  * Compare results side-by-side
  * Direct PDF access when available
  * Track citations and versions
  * Save papers to your library with one click


![Start Your Research Journey](https://www.simplifine.com/_next/image?url=%2Fscreenshots%2Fpaper-search.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Step 2
## Manage Your Library
Smart Reference Manager
Keep your research organized with our intuitive reference manager. Import, organize, and access your papers with ease.
  * Import references from .ris and .bib files
  * Drag and drop PDFs directly
  * Organize papers into custom folders
  * Quick search across all your papers
  * Export citations in multiple formats


![Manage Your Library](https://www.simplifine.com/_next/image?url=%2Fscreenshots%2Freference-manager.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Step 3
## Extract and Analyze
Smart Data Tables
Create custom tables to extract and organize key information from your papers. Our AI helps you analyze and compare papers systematically.
  * Auto-extract data from papers
  * Create custom categories for comparison
  * Get exact quotes and citations
  * Analyze multiple papers simultaneously
  * Export your findings easily


![Extract and Analyze](https://www.simplifine.com/_next/image?url=%2Fscreenshots%2Fdatabook-view.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Step 4
## Generate Literature Reviews
AI-Powered Research Synthesis
Ask specific research questions and get comprehensive literature reviews instantly. Our AI analyzes your selected papers to provide both a narrative synthesis and detailed evidence from each paper.
  * Ask focused research questions about your papers
  * Select relevant papers for your review
  * Get AI-generated narrative summaries
  * See supporting evidence with exact citations
  * Track multiple review sessions for different topics


![Generate Literature Reviews](https://www.simplifine.com/_next/image?url=%2Fscreenshots%2Flitreview-view.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Step 5
## Chat with Your Research
AI Research Assistant
Have natural conversations about your research papers. Our AI can analyze documents, generate visualizations, run simulations, and provide precise citations from your papers.
  * Get verbatim quotes and references from papers
  * Generate graphs and visualizations
  * Run code simulations and analysis
  * Advanced document analysis mode
  * Multi-document context understanding


![Chat with Your Research](https://www.simplifine.com/_next/image?url=%2Fscreenshots%2Fchat.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Frequently Asked Questions
Everything you need to know about Simplifine and how it can help your research
### General
### What exactly does Simplifine do?
Simplifine is a research suite that helps you find, consume, and generate research more efficiently. It combines AI-powered search, paper analysis, note-taking, and collaboration tools in one seamless workspace.
### Who is Simplifine for?
Simplifine is designed for PhD and postdoc researchers and academics who work extensively with academic literature.
### What makes Simplifine different from other research tools?
Unlike traditional reference managers or note-taking apps, Simplifine provides a complete research workspace that integrates all your research tools in one place. Our platform combines traditional research tools with modern AI capabilities, while maintaining a strong focus on data privacy and user control.
### AI Features & Safety
### How does the AI research assistant work?
Our AI assistant streamlines your research workflow by helping you search papers using natural language, extract and compare data across multiple papers, generate literature reviews, and identify research gaps. It analyzes methods, synthesizes findings, and provides instant insights about papers in your library.
### Which features use AI/LLMs and which don't?
We're fully transparent about AI usage. Features like paper search, reference management, PDF reading, note-taking, and spreadsheet editing are traditional tools that don't use LLMs. AI features are clearly labeled and include the AI research assistant, AI chat, AI deep research, and AI literature review generation. You can use Simplifine effectively without engaging with any AI features.
### How do you ensure AI safety and prevent hallucinations?
We implement several safeguards: 1) All AI responses are grounded in your specific research papers with clear citations, 2) We use retrieval-augmented generation to ensure accuracy, 3) The system clearly indicates when it's uncertain, and 4) Users can easily verify AI outputs against source materials. Our AI is instructed to only refer to real sources and not to generate fake research content.
### What happens to my data when using AI features?
When using AI features, only the specific papers or text you explicitly select are processed. After processing, the data is immediately deleted. You maintain full control over what data is analyzed.
### Getting Started
### Can I import my existing papers and notes?
Yes! You can import PDFs directly. Your existing notes and highlights will be preserved and enhanced with our organization tools.
### Do I need technical knowledge to use it?
Not at all! Simplifine is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. While we offer advanced features, the core functionality is straightforward and requires no technical expertise.
### Can I try it before committing?
Yes! Simplifine is free to use.
### Can I import my library from other reference managers like Zotero?
Yes! You can easily import your existing library from Zotero, Mendeley, EndNote, or other reference managers. Simply export your library as a .ris or .bib file from your current reference manager, then import it into Simplifine. Your references, including metadata and annotations, will be preserved and enhanced with our organization tools.
### Security & Privacy
### Is my research data secure and private?
Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and follow strict data protection protocols. Your research data remains private and is never shared without your explicit permission.
### Where is my data stored?
Your data is stored in secure, encrypted servers. We use industry-standard encryption both in transit and at rest, and implement regular security audits.
### Can I delete my data completely?
Yes, you have full control over your data. You can delete individual items or your entire account at any time. When you delete data, it's permanently removed from our servers. To delete your account, please contact us at founders@simplifine.com.
Still have questions?Contact us
![Simplifine](https://www.simplifine.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogo.png&w=384&q=75)
Making research modern with AI-powered tools for academic literature review, analysis, and collaboration.
founders@simplifine.com
[LinkedIn](https://www.simplifine.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/100529065/admin/dashboard/>)[Discord](https://www.simplifine.com/<https:/discord.gg/vvJ6A7MrMv>) [Terms](https://www.simplifine.com/</terms>)[Privacy](https://www.simplifine.com/</pages/privacy_policy>)
© 2024 Simplifine. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
### Simplifine: Revolutionizing Research Workflows

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, Simplifine is transforming the research landscape with its AI-Powered Workspace aimed specifically at academics. Operating under the umbrella of Y Combinator's Batch S24, the company is a trailblazer in making research more efficient.

**The Problem Simplifine Solves**  
Researchers often find themselves drowning in a sea of disconnected tools for literature reviews, data analysis, and writing. Simplifine addresses this chaos head-on. Designed by researchers for researchers, it offers a cohesive suite that integrates various processes into one streamlined platform.

**What Simplifine Offers**  
Picture having an AI assistant akin to JARVIS from Iron Man at your fingertips. Simplifine introduces specialized LLM Agents that can design and execute complex research experiments with the precision of a PhD-level expert. Tasks that used to take weeks can now be accomplished in just minutes.

**Key Features**  
1. **Unified Academic Search**: Search across multiple platforms like arXiv and Semantic Scholar simultaneously and compare results in real time.
2. **Smart Reference Management**: Effortlessly import and organize your research material with customizable folders and easy citation features.
3. **Custom Data Tables**: Use AI to extract and analyze key data points from your literature.
4. **AI-Powered Literature Reviews**: Generate comprehensive reviews quickly by asking targeted research questions.
5. **AI Research Assistant**: Engage in meaningful dialogues about your research, complete with visualizations and simulations.

**Mission & Vision**  
Simplifine’s mission is clear: to simplify the research process. By providing powerful AI tools, they hope to modernize the academic research experience, tackling inefficiencies and enhancing productivity.

**Team & Leadership**  
With a compact team of just two members, Simplifine is agile and focused. They also have the esteemed Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, guiding their strategic direction.

**User-Centric Design**  
The platform is designed to be user-friendly, ensuring that researchers can dive in without needing robust technical expertise. Plus, it’s free to use, making it accessible for everyone from doctoral students to seasoned researchers.

**Privacy & Data Security**  
Security is a top priority. Simplifine employs enterprise-grade encryption, ensuring that all user data remains confidential and under their control.

**Conclusion**  
Simplifine is a breath of fresh air for the academic community. By integrating AI into research workflows, it's not just about making tasks easier; it’s about redefining the entire research experience. If you're tired of juggling multiple tools and want to focus on what really matters—your research—then it might be time to check out [Simplifine](https://www.simplifine.com).

In a world rich with information and yet rife with disorganization, Simplifine stands out as an essential ally for researchers determined to simplify their journey and amplify their impact.
